bill.title: MERIT Act Model Employee Reinstatement for Ill-advised Termination Act
bill.description: To require the reinstatement of recently terminated probationary Federal employees, and for other purposes.

history.action: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
